snippet: Investigators said that the hackers gained entry to the retailer’s systems through a remote network connection normally used by outside vendors.
abstract: Investigators say they believe they have identified entry point through which hackers got into Target's systems, zeroing in on remote access granted through retailer's computerized heating and cooling software; remote connection is normally used by outside vendors.
lead_paragraph: Investigators said that the hackers gained entry to the retailer’s systems through a remote network connection normally used by outside vendors.

headline.main: Heat System Called Door to Target for Hackers
headline.print_headline: Heat System Called Door to Target for Hackers
